verses.roman:
veda-guhya kathā ei ayogya kahite
tathāpi kahiye tāṅra kṛpā prakāśite

synonyms: veda—like the Vedas; guhya—very confidential; kathā—incident; ei—this; ayogya kahite—not fit to disclose; tathāpi—still; kahiye—I speak; tāṅra—His; kṛpā—mercy; prakāśite—to manifest.
translation: To disclose it is not proper, for it should be kept as confidential as the Vedas, yet I shall speak of it to make His mercy known to all.
